Articles.Content:
I have redesigned the Ravenspear V4 stock craft with very good results... Mach 1.08 while still on the runway!!!!! 

Top speed: Mach 2.64 / 901.4 m/s (right before it blew up)

Part count: 36

Mass: 15,486 kg

Surface TWR: 3.88

I love the new feature of the fuselage type being stamped on the hull.

![IkTnp1r.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/IkTnp1r.jpg)

![8itmtW5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8itmtW5.jpg)

![SQR6HSx.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/SQR6HSx.jpg)

I also love the fact that airbrakes are now stock!

![ShdP8wS.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ShdP8wS.jpg)

![iSK7WGl.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/iSK7WGl.jpg)

![HYus3hU.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/HYus3hU.jpg)

Mach 1.01 (358m/s) and still some runway left to go!

![9cKJiee.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/9cKJiee.jpg)

Mach 2.64 / 901.4 m/s (right before it blew up)

![pvMq9P8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/pvMq9P8.jpg)
